node_modules/@inlang/module.deprecated: use the inlang sdk directly https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inlang/sdk

node_modules/@inlang/paraglide-astro.deprecated: use the paraglide-js package directly with v2 or above https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inlang/paraglide-js. the astro adapter is not needed anymore

node_modules/@inlang/paraglide-unplugin.deprecated: use the paraglide-js package directly which exports all bundler plugins in v2 and above https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inlang/paraglide-js

node_modules/@inlang/paraglide-vite.deprecated: the vite plugin is now bundled in the paraglide-js package. please use https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inlang/paraglide-js directly

node_modules/@inlang/plugin.deprecated: use the inlang sdk directly https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inlang/sdk

node_modules/@inlang/recommend-ninja.deprecated: ninja got deprecated in favor of lix validation rules https://github.com/opral/lix-sdk/issues/239

node_modules/@lix-js/client.deprecated: use the lix sdk instead https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lix-js/sdk

node_modules/@lix-js/fs.deprecated: use the lix sdk instead https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lix-js/sdk
